attributes.action: War on Iraq is illegal and Government is Responsible for death of over 35000 Iraqis
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: UK is at higher Risk of Terrorisam than it was before Invasion on Iraq and Afghanistan. Invasion on Iraq was illegal since there were no WMDs. Also over 35000 Iraqis died since the start of the war, which is way more than what was under Sadam Hussain's Regime. Therefore Tony Blair and George Bush are responsible for all thes deaths as Sadam was for deaths of Iraqi's in 1980s.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
